ai-patthana16.85:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana16.85:0.3_0: Next, they place rapture and joy, and happiness.
ai-patthana16.85:1.1_0: I don’t give rise to rapture.
ai-patthana16.85:1.1_1: A cause of rapture doesn’t give rise to rapture. Grounded on rapture and bliss born of immersion. ...
ai-patthana16.85:1.1_2: I don’t arise with rapture and bliss born of rapture.
ai-patthana16.85:2.1_0: I don’t give rise to confidence in those without it.
